pkgmetadata.longdescription: Measuring Disparity // A modular package for measuring disparity from multidimensional matrices. Disparity can be calculated from any matrix defining a multidimensional space. The package provides a set of implemented metrics to measure properties of the space and allows users to provide and test their own metrics (Guillerme (2018) doi:10.1111/2041-210X.13022). The package also provides functions for looking at disparity in a serial way (e.g. disparity through time - Guillerme and Cooper (2018) doi:10.1111/pala.12364) or per groups as well as visualising the results. Finally, this package provides several basic statistical tests for disparity analysis.
